plugin.name: alpha
plugin._long: A plugin to change the opacity of windows.

option.name: modifier
option._long: When the modifier key is held down, you can scroll down and up to adjust the opacity of the window.

option.name: increase
option._long: When the key is held down, you can increase the opacity of the window.

option.name: decrease
option._long: When the key is held down, you can decrease the opacity of the window.

option.name: min_value
option._long: Sets the minimum opacity of the window between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (completely opaque).
